name: GeekCamp SG
description: What is it? Conference for the geeks. No startup talks. No how to get rich talks. This is purely a tech conference. Hashtag: #geekcampsg | Date: 18th October 2014 | Time: 9:30am to 6pm (Afterparty afterwards) | Location: NUS School of Computing. Ticket sales can be found over at Peatix http://geekcampsg14.peatix.com/

name: SG Hack and Tell
description: Present a hack and the tech behind it, not pitch your startup.
